name: FlyhtFall (Game Jam Demo)
description:
Constantly move around the penguin zoo.

This game is purely experimental, and hardly even follows the limitation. I guess the penguins constantly move? Either way I wanted it to be a testing ground for some new concepts I had learned surrounding AI NavMesh pathfinding, AI states and coroutines. Overall I am satisfied with how those things turned out, despite the game being hardly fun to play.

WAD to move. You can't move backwards.

This is also my first solo Unity project uploaded to itch.io!

Link to repository:

https://github.com/Lebyfochs/MiniJam99-FlyhtFall

This game was entered into Mini Jam 99.
